page.title: 12WEAVER'S STUDIO, HODDESDON
page.content: Just a stone's throw from the busy Al0 in a barn at Home Farm you will find 28 yr. old Alison Thompson busy at one of her 3 looms weaving rugs, cushions & wall hangings of landscapes, seaside scenes & historical houses. Her beautiful work is to her own designs using traditional handweaving techniques. It has been exhibited at Craft Fairs in Wales & England & with great success at the London Barbican. Major commissions include libraries, restaurants & offices & much of her work has been sold overseas. She studied Textile Design at Loughborough and in l98l opened The Studio in the Barn. Alison also teaches Art & Design in a Herts Secondary School & gives talks locally. This autumn her first baby is due but her craft will continue as she plans to combine motherhood and weaving !
